mapper.select: SELECT pkid as pkid ,area_name as areaName ,area_short_name as areaShortName ,area_code as areaCode ,area_level as areaLevel ,area_parent_id as areaParentId ,phone_code as phoneCode ,created as created ,create_by as createBy ,updated as updated ,update_by as updateBy FROM sys_area WHERE area_parent_id = #{areaParentId}
